definitions: Move by turning over and over on an axis.
Move in a specified direction by turning over and over.
Turn over and over, especially repeatedly.
Form into a cylinder or ball.
Flatten or spread out with a roller.
Make a continuous deep, resonant sound.
Wrap (something) around itself or another thing.
Move with a swaying or rocking motion.
examples: The ball began to roll down the hill.
The car rolled to a stop.
The ship rolled in the waves.
